q: the tape is Tommy Sheridan . Tommy Sheridan , who was defending himself, asked whether he was one of the "Wapping two top men" regarding the purchase of the tape. Mr Andy Coulson said: It came to Bob Bird first. He alerted me to its existence and I travelled to Glasgow. I viewed the tape and I suggested to Bob he should do all he could to verify the tape, though I believed it to be authentic on my first viewing and the tape was published. The journalist said he decided to resign from his post after more than three years because of mounting coverage over his old job. Mr Andy Coulson , who has always denied any wrong-doing in the phone-hacking

If you're rushing four, there's five gaps, so there's always an outlet for him.( Ben Roethlisberger 's) knack to find that outlet is why I made the comparison, Raji said. In a statement, Eric Schmidt says that by clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. He says that as executive chairman he will work with both men for "a long time to come" and says that "Larry is ready to lead." The company made the surprising announcement as it reported

would have been better if you had insisted on resigning?" Martin asked. "I think so," he said. "How would that have made things better?" It would have been a stronger signal to the world that we didn't accept that kind of behavior, Donald Rumsfeld said. "Did you feel it was your fault?" "No," answered Donald Rumsfeld . "You were responsible, but it wasn't your fault?"

was "not a reaction to competitors." Rather, he said, it was an effort to speed up decision making at the company, which ended the year with about 24,000 employees. Google Inc. has many different businesses and the issue that we have been getting into is there's too many ways( in) which these businesses can be slowed down, Eric Schmidt said. Eric Schmidt , who became CEO in 2001 to bring more management experience to a then-fledgling company, will assume the role of executive chairman, focusing on deals and government outreach, among other things

Donald Rumsfeld also defends the use of harsh interrogation tactics in his interview, saying that they "saved lives." But he also admits that interrogators went past his orders with at least one detainee, Mohammed al-Qahtani : Qahtani would be subjected to sexual humiliation and long periods of sleep deprivation and isolation while in custody at Guantanamo, and his heartbeat at one point dropped to 35 beats per minute. Donald Rumsfeld said he only learned the details of such treatment after the fact- and that interrogators went further than he had authorized. "I didn't approve any of that," Donald Rumsfeld said in

Packers are his favorite team. Lil Wayne reminisces on how the 10-6 Packers defeated Michael Vick and the Philadelphia Eagles, the Atlanta Falcons, and finally the Chicago Bears to get to the big game. Yeah, like I said, this ain't a diss song, Lil Wayne says at the end of the song. "I just love my team, that's the team with them big Gs on the helmet."
